name: WeaponChange
description:
Information:

The theme is Change so I just went with something simple here. There are two ways to change weapons, get hit by an enemy or wait for a pick up item (color orange box) to appear. There are four weapons: Pistol, MachineGun, Bazooka, and a Warp Device. The color of the Bazooka is orange and it will explode once it hits an enemy, though there is no explosion art yet so there will just be an invincible hitbox that will enlarge once triggered. And the color of the Warp Device is black, though this is not a weapon, and what this does is warp you in its current position by either clicking the right mouse button or pressing the E key. You only have 5 lives and the only way to heal is to wait for an item pick up to appear (which is colored green and a bit larger than the weapon pickup). The enemy will increase by number as you play so uhhm yeah. Basic controls are WASD to move and left mouse click to shoot, yeah.
